mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_idx, n_type_idx, notice_title , notice_content) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{NTypeIdx}, #{noticeTitle} , #{noticeContent})
mapper.select: SELECT ii.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, iq.* FROM ( SELECT i.*, u.name FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN userinfo u ON i.user_idx = u.user_idx ORDER BY i.create_date desc ) iq ) ii WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo } ORDER BY rnum
SELECT i.*, u.name FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN userinfo u ON i.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE i.inq_idx = #{inqIdx }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry(inq_idx ,user_idx, title , contents, reply_status) VALUES (inquiry_seq.nextval, #{userIdx }, #{title }, #{contents }, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT ia.*, u.name FROM inquiry_answer ia LEFT JOIN userinfo u ON ia.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE ia.inq_idx = #{inqIdx }
mapper.insert: insert into faq ( faq_idx, f_type_idx, faq_question, faq_answer) values (faq_seq.nextval, #{FTypeIdx} ,#{faqQuestion}, #{faqAnswer})
